title: A Travel Through Time – and Back
abstract: Somehowâ€¦ <time> Disappeared As you might have heard the <time>-element was removed from the HTML5 specification last saturday by Ian “Hixie” Hickson, the editor of the spec. Hixie decided to remove <time> and replace it by the more general <data>-element. A question that came up: Why got<time> removed and why did nobody stop Hixie? Well: There
meta-description: There was a hugh discussion about the removal of the HTML5 time-element and replacement by the data from the specification. The W3C HTML WG solved this issue.
